page.title: 20EALING NORTHN SPORTS CENTRE
page.content:
{The field}is used for cricket and athletics in the summer and football in the winter.You can play tennis on either grass or hard courts.The Lyons Bowling Club was opened in{1914 and {still exists. { The 5 a side{floodlit football pitch} can be used even when it is dark.The fenced gravel patch next to it is for {volley ball.
A new fitness and boxing gym was opened in 1982 by the M.P. Harry Greenway. There is some weight training equipment called a multi-gym,where nine people can exercise at a time.
The{outdoor swimming pool}is now being modernised after a fire and was opened again on 6th July 1985.
